Module.Content:
<script type="text/javascript">

        function clean(idiv) {
          alert('cleaning?');
          var e = document.querySelectorAll(".change_notes");
          for (var i = 0; i < e.length; i++) {
          var html = e[i].innerHTML
            alert(html);
            idiv.write(html);
            break;
          }
        }
       
        function getHtml() {    
          var params = {};  
          params[gadgets.io.RequestParameters.CONTENT_TYPE] = gadgets.io.ContentType.TEXT;
          var url = "http://plugins.intellij.net/plugin/index?pr=idea&pluginId=6351";  
          gadgets.io.makeRequest(url, response, params);
        };
        
        function response(obj, idiv) {  
          var str = obj.text;
          var html =  str.toString(); 
          idiv.write(html);
          clean(idiv);
        };
        
        var idiv = document.createElement("div"); 
        document.body.appendChild(idiv);
        
        gadgets.util.registerOnLoadHandler(getHtml, idiv);
        
        
    </script>
